abstract: Based on The Internet of Things, Radio frequency identification (RFID) has introduced into the University Library Management. The resource sharing can be implemented through internet. Moreover, the book resource and management style has been integrated and optimized. A variety of functions can be achieved by the Internet of Things, including self-borrowing and self-returning, smart inventory, intelligent query, combination of books and information system. Consequently, human-based management and service has been provided to help borrows obtain the necessary knowledge and meet their demands.
meta: Conference: Joint International Conference on Pervasive Computing and the Networked World
